message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints but I can't let this go for less than $10,500. It's a very competitive price for what it offers.
I'm getting close to my budget limit, but I really want this product. Can we meet in the middle at $9,800?
